SEARCH
Package library.domain

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
library.domain.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
Represents a loan operation in the library. A loan stores the userId, mediaId, borrow date, due date, and return date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(String userId, String mediaId, LocalDate borrowDate, LocalDate dueDate)
      Creates a new loan.
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user who borrowed the item
      mediaId - the id of the media item (book or CD)
      borrowDate - the date the item was borrowed
      dueDate - the date the item should be returned

      public int overdueDays(LocalDate currentDate)
      Calculates how many days the loan is overdue.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the current system date
      Returns:
      number of overdue days, or 0 if not overdue
